name: Nirvana: The First Travel
description: Nirvana: The First Travel is a first-person puzzle game, with dialogue driven story, and requires a lot of thinking outside the box.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 or superior Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or superior Memory: 150 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 381 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 or superior Processor: Intel i3 or superior Memory: 300 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 381 MB available space
